Dialogue: Evans leans over it.

Speaker: shane
Dialogue: Lou, are you alright?

Speaker: pacifico
Dialogue: I'm sorry. They know where my family lives.

Speaker: shane
Dialogue: What?!

Speaker: evans
Dialogue: Come on, Shane!

Speaker: shane
Dialogue: Hut!

Speaker: on shane
Dialogue: He has totally caught the Cowboys by surprise. He sweeps around the right side.  The Dallas middle linebacker has recovered and is moving quickly to cut Shane off.  But Reese Evans comes out of nowhere and crushes the guy with a flying block.  Shane cuts downfield and heads for the end zone with nobody near him, except:  For the same safety from the first half who waits for him at the ten.  The safety smiles as he takes a bead on Shane.  Shane heads right for the guy. He puts his head down and smacks helmets with the safety. The guy goes down and Shane runs over him and into the end zone.  AL  Falco scores!

Speaker: on annabelle
Dialogue: She's jumping for joy.

Speaker: ref
Dialogue: Clipping. Number 77 offense.

Speaker: on shane
Dialogue: He's walking slowly back to the line of scrimmage.

Speaker: pacifico
Dialogue: I broke my arm.  Thank you. You saved my ass.

Speaker: shane
Dialogue: I have no idea.

Speaker: lee
Dialogue: I'm so sorry, Shane. I'm sorry, everybody.

Speaker: shane
Dialogue: No problem, Mickey.  Hell of a hit, Reese.

Dialogue: Right after this play. So besides me, who really wants the ball?

Speaker: on shane
Dialogue: He steps up and throws a clean bullet downfield. He roars in pain as he throws it.

Speaker: on murray
Dialogue: The pass is perfect. He pulls it in and beats his man to the end zone.  Redskins win.

Speaker: on crowd
Dialogue: It roars! "Hail to the Redskins" is deafening.  Todd, Rod and Bob are screaming.  O'Neil kisses Augustine.  Annabelle throws a punch into the air.  McGinty is all smiles.     Shane walks up to him and they shake hands.  Pilachowski and Banes hug.  Lee and Andre are hugging and crying.  Cochran is on his knees praying.     Reese Evans joins him.  Wilkinson hugs Jamal.  Clifford Franklin, hometown boy, throws himself into the stands where fans mob him.

Speaker: brian's pov
Dialogue: We HEAR NOTHING, but somehow the pure energy of the moment comes through.

Speaker: on shane
Dialogue: IN the SILENCE, he's walking in SLOW MOTION toward Annabelle. And everybody is smiling.
